body_html:
@suiyuan2009 I am trying to fix this problem, thank you for your log! It helps a lot to locate the bug.

I've refactored the code a lot and going through all these manual test cycles every single time. Maybe I should write some unit tests for the patch to save all these efforts, but I have not figured out the best way to organize it. Any ideas are more than welcomed :)

body:
@suiyuan2009 I am trying to fix this problem, thank you for your log! It helps a lot to locate the bug.

I've refactored the code a lot and going through all these manual test cycles every single time. Maybe I should write some unit tests for the patch to save all these efforts, but I have not figured out the best way to organize it. Any ideas are more than welcomed :)
